#### About

Clinical data scientist, health data analyst and coder, skilled in Python, R, SQL, SAS and Statistical Data Analysis. Founder, mobile medical tech app. Background in Biostatistics, Epidemiology & Data Science, including Classification, Regression, Feature engineering, Data scrapping, manipulation and visualization, and experience analyzing large-scale medical claims, EHR, and clinical data. Strong education in Master of Public Health - MPH focused in Advanced Epidemiology from Columbia University in the City of New York, and a previous MD with 2 years of clinical training. Leadership experience as Teaching Assistant, student leader for international association with 1,000+ members. Ability to talk with a broad range of people, from scientists and doctors to community leaders in all neighborhoods of NYC.
